title: Diploma in Amazon Web Services
headline: Gain an overall understanding of the AWS Cloud platform, including AWS core services with this free online course.
description: This free online Diploma in Amazon Web Services will familiarise you with the services provided by Amazon Web Services (AWS). Are you an App Developer, Data Analyst, Business Analyst, Web Developer, IT Administrator, Data Center Architect, Project Manager, Enterprise Architect, or Programmer? This free online course will get you up to speed on the AWS Cloud platform, including AWS core services, security, pricing and support services.

courseDescription:
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the leading cloud services organisation in the world and they have massive expansion planned for 2020 and beyond. Organizations are now actively looking for professionals who have knowledge of the AWS platform in order to advise them on moving towards the cloud.

If you are an App Developer, Data Analyst, Business Analyst, Web Developer, IT administrator, Data Center Architect, Project Manager, Enterprise Architect, or Programmer and want to gain fundamental and intermediate level skills and enjoy a fascinating high paying career, then this is the course for you. This free online course will build your technical expertise in provisioning, operating, and managing distributed application systems on the AWS platform. The course will explain the concepts of DevOps and show you how to develop and deploy live code into AWS.

Your course tutor is AWS, Microsoft, and Cisco Certified, and he is a senior Enterprise Architect & Project Manager who has extensive experience in managing and deploying enterprise level IT projects. He is excited to share his knowledge and expertise, and transfer skills to new learners. So, why wait? Start this free course and gain an overall understanding of the AWS Cloud platform, including AWS core services, security, pricing and support services.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this diploma course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this diploma course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison diploma is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital diploma: a downloadable diploma in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • diploma: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked diploma, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed diploma: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked diploma in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All diploma are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison diploma, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison diploma, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our diploma pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This is module you will get an introduction to the course, meet your instructors, and look at the agenda of the different topics and modules.
topics: Introduction to Amazon Web Services - Learning Outcomes
Introduction to Amazon Web Services - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about the basic building blocks of the AWS cloud platform.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about the different storage classes that AWS offers. Additionally, you will learn about the databases that you are able to create and manage within the console.
topics: AWS Storage and Databases - Learning Outcomes
AWS Storage and Databases - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about the networking components that AWS offers such as: Virtual Private Clouds and Cloud Distributions.
topics: Networking Components in AWS - Learning Outcomes
Migrating by using the Well-Architected Tool
Networking Components in AWS - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Diploma in Amazon Web Services - First Assessment
modules.description: You must score 80% or more to pass this assessment. Remember, if you do not achieve the required standard after the first attempt, you can re-take the assessment until a successful outcome is achieved.
topics: Diploma in Amazon Web Services - First Assessment

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about the different components that make AWS a highly available platform and how you can implement those within your organisation.
topics: High Availability Components of AWS - Learning Outcomes
Working with the AWS management tools
High Availability Components of AWS - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module we will get into the basics of DevOps and start configuring our system with the software required to create a Devops pipeline.
topics: Installing AWS Project Brief - Java App

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn how to create and launch code pipelines in AWS.
topics: Installing and importing CodeStart project in Eclipse

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will learn about the various tools that are available to monitor and streamline the devops code pipeline.
topics: Monitoring an EC2 Instance with CloudWatch

modules.details: Diploma in Amazon Web Services - Second Assessment
modules.description: You must score 80% or more to pass this assessment. Remember, if you do not achieve the required standard after the first attempt, you can re-take the assessment until a successful outcome is achieved.
